courses.title: Beginner Guitar
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano
courses.description: Advanced techniques for piano players looking to take their skills to the next level.

courses.title: Vocal Training
courses.description: Master your vocal techniques and improve your singing with professional tips and exercises.

courses.title: Drum Basics
courses.description: Get started with drums, learn about different rhythms, and practice basic drumming patterns.

courses.title: Music Theory
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and notation.
